headline: Apollo Launches Three Evergreen ELTIFs to Broaden Private Markets Access
summary: APO debuts three evergreen ELTIFs under Luxembourg's ELTIF 2.0 rules, expanding private markets access for investors worldwide.

headline: Jim Cramer on Apollo Global: “It’s Always Traded at a Pretty Big Discount to the Market”
summary: Apollo Global Management, Inc. (NYSE:APO) is one of the relatively cheap S&P 500 stocks Jim Cramer talked about. Cramer discussed the company’s projected earnings growth and valuation. He commented: “There are even a couple of private equity stocks that look interesting based on this screen, like Apollo, which is now a leader in both private […]
